verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He that dwelleth (men)
He that dwelleth (women)
He that dwelleth (men)
He that dwelleth (women)
In the secret place of the Most High (all)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Shall abide (men)
Shall abide (women)
Shall abide (men)
Shall abide (women)
Beneath the shadow of the Almighty. (all)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I will say of the Lord
He is my refuge and my fortress,
I will say of the Lord
He is my refuge, my fortress,
And I will put my trust in God.
